CIPHER.0.cipherString: God is not present in idols. Your feelings are your god. The soul is your temple.
CIPHER.0.question: Solve this aristocrat.

CIPHER.1.cipherString: Once you start telling people you're famous, they believe you.

CIPHER.2.cipherString: Women, can't live with them, can't live without them.

CIPHER.3.cipherString: Jump, and you will find out how to unfold your wings as you fall.

CIPHER.4.cipherString: We all know pain doesn't exist without some coexisting depression.

CIPHER.5.cipherString: Get all the fools on your side and you can be elected to anything.

CIPHER.7.cipherString: A different language is a different vision of life.

CIPHER.8.cipherString: October, that's when they pay off for playing ball.

CIPHER.9.cipherString: You've got to guard against speaking more clearly than you think.

CIPHER.10.cipherString: I have never planned to have babies by a certain age.
